name: Turtle: VoidRunner (itch)
description:
After committing honorable sepuku Turtle finds himself in hell.

Turtle is compelled in death to do what he loved most when he was alive: Race. But, he needs the minds of hell's other denizens to do so. As he explores their minds one question seems to permeate, "Why would anyone choose hell over heaven?"

The objective of this innovative and philosophical platformer is to reach a goal speed. Meaning small mistakes are fine and there is no restarting or death. After all, Turtle is already dead. Instead players find themselves entering a zen-like flow as they attempt to achieve maximum velocity.
